title: Lake front land in Digana
details:
Located amidst the lush green canopy and bordering the enviable view of the Mahaveli River lies a 6.5 acre spacious land perfect space for building your profitable resort or spectacular hotel and give your clients those intimate escapes with memorable moments in this paradise island.

Only 1km from Digana Town, Land produces Coconut, Tamarid and Mangoes enough for a small commercial venture. this property boarders Kumar Sangakkara's
commercial property

Land can be accessed via main road

All this for just Rs. 65 million
